name: Mr. Grouch's Clean Sweep
description:
It’s spring, and that means it’s time to clean house! And Mr. Grouch needs a little help.

Join him in this collection of mini games that’s targeted at younger players, but ideal for adults as well. Help Mr. Grouch de-clutter in a hidden object game, help him match items in his house, repair broken paintings in sliding puzzle and more!

Set in the world of Mr. Grouch, Clean Sweep features four mini games that are designed to teach kids pattern recognition, word to object pairing, and early stage spatial awareness.

Hidden Object Game - Mr. Grouch is decluttering! Help him find items he wants amongst all the clutter.

Matching Game - Mr. Grouch has lost his glasses and needs a little help knowing what items he has and which ones to keep or throw out. Help him by matching the item to the word.

Broken Paintings Game - Bubbles, Mr. Grouch’s dog, has been mischievous again and has broken several of Mr. Grouch’s paintings. How naughty! Help Mr. Grouch re-assemble each painting in this ‘sliding block’-style puzzle game.

Two-of-a-kind - Mr. Grouch is sorting out his household items. Help him match up each item within the time limit.


Game Features:
- Separate Kids / Adults difficulty level for younger and older players
- High quality game art and animations
- Four mini-games, and multiple game levels equals tons of replay-ability
- High score feature for each game
- No Ads, No In-App Purchases, No Marketing


And if you like Clean Sweep, check out Mr. Grouch’s Lawn Invasion for more puzzle action featuring Terrance, Thomas and Delina Mole!
